Green Knight Story.description: After defeating the dragon, Sir PK enters the towerâ€™s depths and discovers Princess Harriet bound in heavy chains. Her eyes light up with hope as she sees her rescuer. With a swift, determined effort, PK begins to free her, ready to bring her back to safety

Journey To Amalitech.description: Atongo, a talented young man, receives an exciting job offer from Amalitech, a leading tech company. Filled with anticipation and hope, he prepares to embark on a new chapter in his life, eager to seize the opportunity and prove his skills in the tech world.
